parameters: \fs[18]...... And that's pretty much what happened
\fs[18]So, what did you do after that?
\fs[28]没办法呀，我自己又买多了一本······
\fs[18]I prefer to keep it for reading....
\fs[28]我还是比较喜欢收藏起来看……
\fs[18]Unless I'm forced to, I'm really slow when reading and doing homework
\fs[28]除非逼不得已，我看书写作业都会很慢
\fs[18]So that's why you're always the last one to finish the exams?
\fs[28]所以你才老是考试最后一个写完？
\fs[18]Hahaha...... that's because I don't know the answers……
\fs[28]哈哈哈……那个是因为我不知道答案……
\fs[18]But I really do read books slowly...... Unlike Shio, quantum reading speed
\fs[28]但是我看书确实比较慢…… 不像汐，你是量子阅读
\fs[18]I'm just average, if you're slow, a book a day is also fine.
\fs[28]我还好啦，慢的话一天一本书也可以
\fs[18]Yeah yeah, the whole world knows that
\fs[18]Yeah yeah, the whole world knows that
\fs[18]At best, I don't take the initiative to talk to strangers
\fs[28]我顶多是不太爱主动和陌生人讲话而已
\fs[18]And who plays Otome games in class?
\fs[18]Is something wrong? Do you want to see a doctor?
\fs[18](Spoken slowly, without even a hint of a joking tone)
\fs[28](缓缓地说了出来，语气中听不出一丝戏谑)
\fs[18](He looked at the fading gray-blue skyline in the distance of the field)
\fs[28](他眺望着操场远处逐渐暗淡的灰蓝色天际线)
\fs[18](The hustle and bustle of Yume Sakura high school)
\fs[18](Apart from the scattered lights of the activity area, only the outlines of the undulating buildings can be seen)
\fs[28](现在除了星星点点的活动部灯光，只能看见高低起伏的楼宇轮廓)
\fs[18](How can I describe what I'm feeling at this moment?)
\fs[18](The smell of vigorously growing grass on the field, a sense of security being lightly supported by the warm soil under the soles of my feet)
\fs[28](操场上青草旺盛生长的气味，被脚掌心下温暖的泥土轻轻托住的安全感)
\fs[18](The buzz and roar of jets passing by above, the touch of a sultry evening breeze flowing past my fingertips)
\fs[28](空中经过的喷气式飞机的嗡嗡轰鸣，稍带闷热的晚风拂过指尖的触感)
\fs[18](The night where the spring equinox approaches, accompanied by the roar of the students)
\fs[28](春分将至的夜晚，伴随着周围同学们的嬉闹声)
\fs[18](It's as if everything is reflecting the yearning in my heart right now)
\fs[28](仿佛一切都在映衬着此时心中的向往)
\fs[18](Even using all of my energy to capture all this)
\fs[28](纵使用尽全身的力气去记录这一切)
\fs[18](It's still difficult to grasp such an indescribable but coveted scenery)
\fs[28](也难以抓住眼下这番难以言喻却又梦寐以求的场景)
\fs[28](如此理所当然，如此转瞬即逝)
\fs[18]I've been thinking recently..... how long can we live like this?
\fs[28]我最近总是在想……这样的生活还能过多久？
\fs[18]Not just high school life, but everything we have now
\fs[28]不只是高中，还有现在的所有一切
\fs[18]I hope it will last really long
\fs[18]But one day, it will all be over won't it？
\fs[28]但总有一天会结束的不是吗？
\fs[18]Let's say, if everything here right now, would last for 1 more minute
\fs[28]假如说，如果现在所有这一切，只剩下最后1分钟
\fs[18]After 1 minute, no matter what happened in the past
\fs[28]这1分钟过后，无论过去发生过什么
\fs[18]No matter how much you miss, how deep the bonds go
\fs[28]即使有再多的思念，再深的羁绊
\fs[18]The daily life in this school, all the feelings of this moment
\fs[28]这所学校日常也好，此刻所有的感受也好
\fs[18]And...... all the stories that might happen in the future between Shio and I
\fs[28]还有……我和汐之间所有未来可能发生的故事
\fs[18]After this 1 last minute, everything will end
\fs[28]这1分钟过后，将全部会被宣告停止
\fs[18]From then on, there will be no more interactions between us
\fs[28]从此往后，我们之间不再会有任何交集
\fs[18]We'll each be in different places, having different experiences
\fs[28]各自在不同的地方，有着不同的遭遇
\fs[18]Different trajectories, different worries, different experiences every day
\fs[28]不同的轨迹，不同的烦恼，不同的每一天
\fs[18]If it were Shio...... How would you plan to say goodbye?
\fs[28]如果是汐的话……你会打算用什么方式来告别呢？
\fs[18](What I cherish in this moment, everything, bidding farewell in the next second.....)
\fs[28](此刻我所珍视的，所有一切，都要在下一秒和我告别……)
烟花发射升空的声音（没有爆炸声）
烟花爆炸，然后持续有烟花升空，爆炸的声音
\}\#A rising flame, roaring explosion, and then bursting into the most brilliant light
\{\#火光升腾，爆炸轰鸣，然后绽放出最灿烂的光芒
\}\#This very moment, the school field and teaching building illuminated under the curtain of night
\{\#夜幕下的学校操场，教学楼，在这一瞬间被全部照亮
\}\#The cheering and joyful screams of the surrounding students coming one after another
\{\#周围同学们的欢呼声、尖叫声此起彼伏
\}\#Involuntarily breaking all the tranquility and stiffness of the night sky
\{\#不由分说地打破了夜空所有的宁静和死板
\}\#In its unforgettable and unpredictable stance, it challenges all common sense
\{\#以它最出人意料又难以让人忘却的姿态，挑战着所有的常识
\fs[18]I will utilize all my strength, all my feelings
\fs[28]我会用尽我全部的力气，全部的感情
\fs[18]Leaving the brightest memories for those who care about me, those who love me
\fs[28]为在意我的人，爱我的人，留下最灿烂的回忆
\fs[18]Even if it's sad, even if I'm reluctant......
\fs[28]即使是如此难过，即使是如此不舍……
\fs[18]I will let them see the best of me in that moment
\fs[28]我也会让他们看到我最好的一刻
\fs[18]After a long time, they might forget me
\fs[28]很久之后，或许他们会把我忘却
\fs[18]Or you might not remember things about me
\fs[28]或许你也可能想不起和我的事情了
\fs[18]If I'm forgotten...... it will definitely be a sad thing
\fs[28]如果被忘记了的话……也许确实是件伤心的事情
\fs[18]I will use up all my strength and let them see the best of me
\fs[28]我也要竭尽我全部的力气，让他们看到最好的我
\fs[18]Let you see the best of me
\fs[18]Because this is what I can do, the only thing I can do......
\fs[28]因为这是我能够做到的，仅此唯一的……
\fs[18]And express my thanks as much as I can
\fs[18]Something that one as cowardly...... as ordinary as I am.....
\fs[28]是如此懦弱的我……如此不争气的我……
\fs[18]Ah...... I feel like I've said some embarrassing things......
\fs[18]Shio is always like this, always in front of me
\fs[18]That's why I'm always behind chasing Shio
\fs[28]所以我才一直在后面追着汐
\fs[18]Wish I could catch up to you someday
\fs[28]真希望有一天能在后面追上你
\fs[18]Hope that I can still spend this summer together with Shio
\fs[28]今年的夏天，也希望能和汐一起渡过呢
\fs[18]Recently I've been worried about gains and losses
\fs[28]最近莫名其妙的有点患得患了
\fs[18]Are you going to turn into a Chuunibyou Shounen?
\fs[28]你是不是要转型成电波系少年？
\fs[18]Didn't you also say something unexplainable just now?
\fs[28]你刚不也说了莫名其妙的话
\fs[18]Wasn't that because you asked me a strange question?
\fs[28]还不是因为你问我奇怪的问题?
\fs[28](按耐不住的情感突然间喷涌而出)
\fs[18](Like a dust-covered, old memory, suddenly awakened in a corner of my body)
\fs[28](像是被尘封的，久远的记忆，在身体的某个角落被突然唤醒)
\fs[18](From the tips of my fingers, to the palms of my hands, extending to the forearm, to the arm, to the chest, and continuing to spread)
\fs[28](从手指尖，到手心，延伸到手臂，到胳膊，到胸口，然后继续蔓延)
\fs[18](As with previous years, the fireworks festival ended on time at 9 o' clock.)
\fs[28](如同像往年一样，花火大会准时在9点结束)
\fs[18](Takuya didn't say a lot until he left)
\fs[28](直到临走之前，塔库亚都没有再多说什么话)
\fs[18](Thinking about his matter, I unknowingly walked right up to the door of my house)
\fs[28](想着他的事情，不知不觉走到了家门口)
\fs[18](Everytime I go home, I always think about strange things)
\fs[28](每次回家，总是在想奇奇怪怪的事情)
\fs[18](Even if I hit a telephone pole, or walk into a pit)
\fs[28](就算在路上撞到电线杆，或者踩到坑里了)
\fs[18](I would probably unconciously get up and continue walking forward)
\fs[28](估计也会不自觉地爬起来继续往前走)
\fs[28](没有任何事情可以打断我的思路)
\fs[18](For so many years, I haven't carefully observed what was on the side of the road)
\fs[28](所以导致这么多年了，也没有仔细观察过到底路边都有些啥)
\fs[18](I always forget the scene when I arrive at the door)
\fs[28](总是一到家门口就想不起来了)
\fs[18](Time to take a bath and head to bed. There will be a full day of activities tomorrow.....)
\fs[28](先洗个澡睡觉吧，明天还有一天的活动来着……)
